articles.author: Phillip van Niekerk
articles.title: PUTIN'S LITTLE AMERICAN HELPERS: AD2016, again and again: Arrest of senior FBI official puts focus on Russia's role in ascent of Trump - Daily Maverick
articles.description: The full extent of one of Russia’s most successful intelligence operations — helping to elect Donald Trump as President of the US — may never be known, but the blows to the credibility of America’s spy agencies are still coming.
articles.content: Last week, Charles McConigal, a former senior FBI official, was arrested and charged in a federal court in Manhattan for being in the pay of the Russian oligarch Oleg Deripaska, a man with deep ties … [+8669 chars]

articles.author: Lisa Schlein
articles.title: Children Denied Same Access to Treatment for HIV/AIDS as Adults - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: UNAIDS says thousands of children are dying from HIV/AIDS because, unlike adults, they do not receive treatment for the deadly disease
articles.content:
GENEVA  The U.N.s main AIDS program says thousands of children are dying from HIV/AIDS because, unlike adults, they do not receive treatment for the deadly disease.
HIV/AIDS is no longer an automati… [+2261 chars]
